metadata.description: Draft orders by Major General Basilio Valde on the Award of Military Merit Medal to Sgt. Wayne L. Kaufman of the Information and Education Section, Headquarters, USAFFE for exceptionally meritorious service in furtherance of the war effort of the United Nations

metadata.title: Draft orders by Major General Basilio Valde on the Award of Military Merit Medal to Sgt. Wayne L. Kaufman
